name: Ken Alston
seeking: Sustainability consultants and ESG advisors for circular economy partnerships. Environmental nonprofits and green technology providers for joint educational content and referral agreements.
who_you_serve: Environmental organizations and sustainability-focused businesses adopting circular economy practices.
what_you_do: Co-found Circularity Edge providing business coaching and education focused on sustainable circular economy practices.
offering: Business Coaching, Business Consulting, Online Education for Business Owners, Podcast Host.
social_proof: Part of The Breeden Company, which has over 60 years of experience in residential living and has won numerous awards for their communities.
bio: Part of The Breeden Company, which has over 60 years of experience in residential living and has won numerous awards for their communities.
business_focus: Co-found Circularity Edge providing business coaching and education focused on sustainable circular economy practices. (luxury apartments)
